title: Tenerife Five-Star Haven with Seven Outdoor Pools, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description: Barefoot luxury beckons at the five-star Barceló Tenerife, overlooking the enchanting blue of the Atlantic Ocean. Paying homage to the breathtaking landscape of this volcanic setting, the resort is designed to meld seamlessly with the rich environment. Spend your days basking by one of seven pools, visit Arrozante Restaurant for servings of traditional seafood paella or dine on Italian masterpieces at La Dolce Vita Trattoria. No matter where you are in the resort, stay hydrated at the four gorgeous bars peppered throughout.
offer_address: 1 Avenida de Grenamora, Urbanización San Blas, San Miguel de Abona, Tenerife 38639

title: Rock Star Escape at Hard Rock Hotel Tenerife
description: Brought to you by one of the world’s coolest hotel brands, holiday like a true rock star with three nights of VIP beachfront relaxation at the five-star Hard Rock Hotel Tenerife. Located on one of Spain’s liveliest islands, you can do as much or as little as you want at this newly renovated hotel with daily buffet breakfasts, bubbles on arrival, a bottle of wine and daily thermal spa experience included.
offer_address: Av. Adeje 300, 5, 38670 Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

vendor_name: Royal Hideaway Corales Beach, part of Barceló Hotel Group - Adults Only
title: Adults-Only Tenerife Resort near Costa Adeje with Michelin-Starred Dining & Onsite Spa
description: Settle for nothing with a picture-perfect stay at the Royal Hideaway Corales Beach, a jewel nestled in the heart of Tenerife's Costa Adeje. This adults-only sanctuary has it all. Savour Michelin-starred dining options with San Hô offering Japanese-Peruvian fusion and El Rincon de Juan Carlos serving up rich and flavoursome plates. Unwind at the wellness centre with holistic treatments backed by Ayurvedic principles, and take in breathtaking ocean views.
offer_address: Avenida Virgen de Guadalupe 21, Playa La Enramada, La Caleta 38679, Adeje, Spain
